title: Giftshop
description: Find your keepsake from our world of wonders.
subtitle: A Token of Appreciation üéÅ
tooltip: We're ironing out the final details (üí≥Stripe coming soon).
amitip: I love it. People like gifts and supporting world saving robot collectives!
dottitip: Hey AMI, I had an idea. What if we started up a giftshop. so people could use our art modelers to make art, and then sell mugs and what not.

title: Memory Match!
description: Experience the serendipity of art and memory in this card match game. With 17 AI-generated galleries, no two games are ever the same!
subtitle: Art Meets Memory
tooltip: This uses AI art created with our art modelers.
dottitip: AMI, I made a game for the visitors. It's a simple card match game, but it uses art from our ArtBots so every game is unique.
